articles.title: The MBTA says it’s still ‘testing’ South Station fare gates. Commuters are calling them ‘obnoxious.’
articles.description:
On a breezy weekday morning in January, Frank Truscott, of Dorchester, disembarked an inbound commuter rail train at South Station and approached a phalanx of fare gates separating him from the city. The 55-year-old IT worker planted his phone screen on the gate’s sensor. Its folding doors remained obstinately shut. He walked a few steps […]
